name: Hobo Merchant - Trading Game
description:
Become a PRO at trading street commodities and race against time for quick flips - buying low and selling high - to cash in! 

• Buy low and sell high perfecting your trade

• Hire Tipsters for quick flips and trade intel

• Accept under the table deals at a discount

• Raise money from fellow hobos in exchange for a cut of the profits!

• Unlock perks and different game modes to keep it interesting!

• 14 street commodities to trade

• Earn rep on your journey to becoming a PRO

• Track your trading statistics

• Global leaderboards

• Simple, quick and TONS of replay-ability

• Fresh content on its way!
